Class AbstractClientMessageHandler<T extends Message>

  • java.lang.Object
    • to.sven.androidrccar.client.logic.handler.AbstractClientMessageHandler<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The concrete Message type, that is handled by the implementor.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMessageHandler<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:

extends java.lang.Object
implements IMessageHandler<T>
